sentences.en: Adolescence is the process of going from childhood to maturity.
sentences.cn: 青春期是从少年到成年的过渡期.

sentences.en: Beth shows a maturity way beyond her 16 years.
sentences.cn: 贝丝表现出一种远远超出她16岁年龄的成熟。

sentences.en: Customers are told what their policies will be worth on maturity, not what they are worth today.
sentences.cn: 客户们被告知的是他们的保险单到期时的价值，不是现在的价值。

sentences.en: Customers are told what their policies will be worth on maturity.
sentences.cn: 客户被告知保险单到期时的价值。

sentences.en: Fruit maturity may play a part in phenotypic characterization.
sentences.cn: 果实成熟期使这种表现型特征可能明显地起一些作用.

sentences.en: Girls generally reach sexual maturity two years earlier than boys.
sentences.cn: 通常女孩性发育成熟要比男孩早两年。

sentences.en: He appreciated her acknowledgement of his maturity.
sentences.cn: 她承认他的成熟，他对此心怀感激。

sentences.en: He has maturity beyond his years.
His behaviour spoke of an early maturity.
sentences.cn: 他的举止流露出早熟的痕迹。

sentences.en: Humans experience a delayed maturity; we arrive at all stages of life later than other mammals.
sentences.cn: 人类发育较缓——在生命的各个阶段，我们都晚于其他哺乳动物。

sentences.en: Lacking self-confidence and maturity, many teenagers are left feeling very vulnerable.
sentences.cn: 许多十几岁的孩子既缺乏自信又不够懂事，所以感情上十分脆弱。

sentences.en: Maturity and emotional sophistication can't be faked.
sentences.cn: 成熟和情感上的老道是装不出来的。

sentences.en: One day you’ll have the maturity to understand.
sentences.cn: 有一天等你长大后你就明白了。

sentences.en: These latest paintings show how the artist has really grown in maturity.
sentences.cn: 这些最新的画作显示画家已经真正地步向成熟了.

sentences.en: These plants ought to reach maturity after five years.
sentences.cn: 这些植物五年后就该长成了.

sentences.en: These youngsters are advancing towards maturity.
sentences.cn: 这些青年人正在逐渐成熟.

sentences.en: This is the period at which the body attains maturity.
sentences.cn: 这是身体发育成熟的时期.
我们成年之后不再长个儿。

words.tran_cn: 成熟的；充分考虑的；到期的；成年人的
成熟；化脓；生殖细胞之形成
使…成熟；使…长成；慎重作出
[生物]成熟；[会计][金融]到期；完备

phrases.tran_cn: 能力成熟度模型；软件能力成熟度模型
初定偿还期；原始到期期限

trans.tran_cn: 成熟，完备，（票据等的）到期，[地]壮年期
trans.tran_en: the quality of behaving in a sensible way like an adult
